Reviews.Content: location hotel located neighborhood metro stop stores café corte ingles department store metro stop centrum tourist looking nice price hotel recommended hotel lobby simple person front desk except rude breakfast recommended offer promotion 50 offer price forget outside breakfast café breakfast scramble eggs sausage sort breads pastry ham cheese fruit coffee milk chocolate powder hole 4 elevator run nice flat tv minibar airco security box toiletries amenities extra blankets pillows clean day choose change towels day conclusion looking outside center qualityprice relation close cab metro 5 6 minutes walking

Reviews.Author: PATRACLEO
Reviews.Content: hotel 5 min walking distance plaza de espana close chopping centers value money restaurant available buffet breakfast discounted rate € 11 instead € 18 clean suitable floor nice view town receptionists professionally helpful respects

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel but the service ....”
Reviews.Author: the_expert_traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel situated madrid central nice pedestrian plenty cafe restaurant local people turist hall simple clean clean moreover isnt carpet cleaner bathroom ok wifi free hall receptionist internet connection paid fare breakfast outside hotel couple euros save money

Reviews.Title: “Basic but comfortable close to the centre of Madrid”
Reviews.Author: EUConsumer
Reviews.Content: simple clean wellpriced hotel albeit minimum services close centre madrid look nh alberto bedrooms bathrooms comfortable restaurant serves breakfast closed times service limited deliveries nearby pizzeria

Reviews.Title: “Business hotel in central Madrid”
Reviews.Author: mikebuckland
Reviews.Content: business hotel reasonably located visit central madrid probably avoided quiet nights sleep window kept awake traffic 24x7 closed dislike air conditioning traffic audible quieter front hotel moved centre stay nearby building pokey breakfasts cheap hotel expensive reception service attentive polite caring offered chase taxi driver overcharged

Reviews.Title: “Small, simple, but efficient”
Reviews.Author: EdwinJagger
Reviews.Content: ive stayed nh hotels lot spain typical chain comfortable modern clean bit basic upside spotlessly clean comfortable bathrooms equipped modern complimentary nh bathroom supplies shower gel etc delightful service pizza pasta pretty location slightly busy noisy city centre downside bit theyre fine short stays reception staff dealt abrupt cold deal bar expected suppose 3 star gym pool ditto ironing facilities note hotel owners ironing board business trips overall pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “rooms like closets, small ones”
Reviews.Author: hbon
Reviews.Content: worth money am pretty booked elevator shaft time barely bigger low uncomfortable double bed air conditioning didnt temperature control yelled piece bread breakfast buffet service rude location excellent stay street ac recoletos nicer service
